description:
Do you play a lot of video sports games with your friends? Have you ever found yourself losing track of who's won how many games and which teams have won in previous playoffs? Are you a PS3 or xBox sports games fanatic looking to enhance your experience? Are you tired of trying to remember who used what team and who took over at what point in the tournament?

If you answered 'yes' to any of these questions, then Game On! is the app for you!

Game On! is an app that lets you create a virtual tournament, for example for head to head xBox / PS3 sports playoffs vs your friends, and lets you play through it so you can view who won what games, by how much, when they won, and how they won.

Game On! includes all four major sports built-in, including support for the latest updated MLB wild-card playoff format and also support for the NFL's unique first-round bye.

FEATURES:
- Name your tournament
- Select colours and names for 2 users
- Select from four major sports, NHL, MLB, NFL, and NBA
- Randomize seeds for a completely new tournament each time, or select your favorites
- Choose which user controls which team
- Save your tournaments and view tournament info from the load screen
- Auto-generating matchups
- Matchups screen shows matchup details for all games in a series
- Each sport has unique options when finishing games (I.E. overtime / extra innings)
- Forced user takeover when the same ends up facing themselves
- Unique logos for every sport, conference, and team

If you play sports video games, this app is an absolute MUST-HAVE. Just think about it -- it allows you to play tournaments against your friends without ever having to make it on a console!

Don't hesitate -- Game On!
